alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Harrison; Mercer; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:07AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Worth, northwestern Grundy, southwestern Mercer and central Harrison Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Irena, or 16 miles south of Mount Ayr, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Bethany, Princeton, Grant City, Ridgeway, Eagleville, Cainsville, Spickard, Irena, Blythedale, Mount Moriah, Tindall, Brimson, Allendale, Denver, Modena, Hatfield, Mill Grove and Martinsville. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 92 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Missouri.
